name: v3.2.5
body:
## What's Changed
* cleaner CMake file: add options by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/946
* Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.13 to 3.28.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/950
* Bump uraimo/run-on-arch-action from 3.0.0 to 3.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/949
* Bump actions/setup-python from 5.5.0 to 5.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/948
* Bump actions/setup-node from 4.3.0 to 4.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/951
* Bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/947
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/953
* Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.16 to 3.28.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/952
* Bump ossf/scorecard-action from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/954
* Bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.6.0 to 4.7.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/955
* faster and smaller adaparse by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/956
* feat: Optimize `to_string` by @mertcanaltin in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/959
* fix(url): handle tab/newline-only inputs in set_port by @watilde in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/961
* Update web platform tests (url) by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/962
* fix(url): handle :port values in host setter by @watilde in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/963
* Update web platform tests (url) by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/964
* More portable PIC by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/966
* perf: use simdutf for idna by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/960
* chore: release v3.2.5 by @github-actions in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/965

## New Contributors
* @watilde made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/961

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v3.2.4...v3.2.5

name: v3.2.2
body:

name: v3.2.0
body:
Ada now supports Unicode 16.

## What's Changed
* Bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.6.0 to 4.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/899
* Bump ossf/scorecard-action from 2.4.0 to 2.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/898
* Bump uraimo/run-on-arch-action from 2.8.1 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/897
* Bump github/codeql-action from 3.28.8 to 3.28.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/896
* Bump pygithub from 2.5.0 to 2.6.1 in /tools/release by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/895
* fix: resolve std::system_error in adaparse on Windows by @myd7349 in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/901
* for maximal portability, use only ASCII by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/905
* add an option to not include any urlpattern code by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/904
* refactor amalgate.py by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/903
* fix coverity related issues by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/907
* add caret char to path percent-encode set by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/908
* apply new urlpattern tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/909
* update toascii.json and urltestdata.json by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/910
* update ada-idna to v0.3.1 by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/911
* Update web platform tests (url) by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/913
* chore: release v3.2.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/914


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v3.1.3...v3.2.0

name: v3.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* fix edge case where hash and search is empty by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/878
* improve urlpattern::match() performance by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/879
* add fail-fast: false to macos install by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/880
* reduce string allocations in urlpattern by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/881
* add const qualifier to several methods by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/882
* use gcc12 on s390x by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/883
* update wpt-updater to open different prs by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/884
* Update web platform tests (url) by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/886
* reduce string allocations in url_pattern_init::process by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/887
* further reduce unnecessary string copies by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/888
* Improve fuzzing coverage of URLPattern by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/889
* chore: release v3.1.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/890


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v3.1.0...v3.1.1

name: v3.0.0
body:
Please [read our announcement for Ada](https://www.yagiz.co/release-of-ada-v3/)'s next major release: v3.0.0

## What's Changed
* migrate to c++20 by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/726
* update doxygen-awesome-css to v2.3.3 by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/731
* update github workflows by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/729
* simplify release generator by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/730
* doc: add users by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/732
* update ada::idna to c++20 by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/733
* check template arguments with constexpr by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/735
* simplify endian handling by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/737
* lemire/more constexpr by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/738
* allows you to benchmark against 1 chosen URL. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/742
* fix aarch64 build errors by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/749
* remove unnecessary std::string_view creation by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/754
* build(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 3.26.6 to 3.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/747
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.1.7 to 4.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/746
* build(deps): bump debian from `2ccc7e3` to `ad86386` by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/744
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.3.2 to 8.3.3 in /tools/release by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/743
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.3 to 4.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/745
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.2.0 to 4.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/755
* more c++20 changes by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/751
* merge url implementation to single file by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/757
* remove ada_constexpr declaration by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/758
* simplify logging by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/759
* the example should be simpler by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/760
* introduce a new method (set_host_to_base_host) to replace set_host when set_host is unnecessary by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/762
* Update web platform tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/763
* build(deps): bump uraimo/run-on-arch-action from 2.7.2 to 2.8.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/768
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.2.1 to 4.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/767
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-python from 5.2.0 to 5.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/766
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.3.4 to 4.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/765
* remove dockerfile and clang-format-ignore by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/771
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.4 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/774
* build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.4.0 to 4.4.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/777
* build(deps): bump url from 2.5.2 to 2.5.3 in /benchmarks/competitors/servo-url by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/775
* avoid network access by default by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/773
* build(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 3.26.10 to 3.27.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/778
* build(deps): bump pygithub from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0 in /tools/release by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/776
* update cpm to v0.40.2 by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/764
* Small changes by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/780
* fix linting issues by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/781
* dowgrading CPM to 0.40.0 + including full version by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/782
* update readme and add clients by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/787
* use more c++20 functions by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/788
* update servo-url and fix detection by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/789
* build(deps): bump jidicula/clang-format-action from 4.13.0 to 4.14.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/792
* build(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 3.27.1 to 3.27.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/791
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.4.0 to 4.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/790
* The documentation should only be updated on releases by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/799
* update ada_idna to support unicode 15.1 by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/797
* add urlpattern to update-wpt.sh by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/794
* this looks too complicated! by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/803
* Update README.md by @cjauvin in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/807
* basic bazel integration by @mikea in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/809
* improve bazel github ci by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/811
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.3.3 to 8.3.4 in /tools/release by @dependabot in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/819
* removing git check by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/828
* readme: D bindings for Ada by @kassane in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/830
* implement URLPattern by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/785
* add urlpattern::test() tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/834
* fix: Improve set_port validation by @mertcanaltin in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/839
* address coverity issues by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/843
* try to fix fuzzer by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/845
* add pluggable regex engine support by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/837
* extend tests and oss-fuzz by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/848
* simplify github workflows by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/849
* move implementation to header files by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/847
* make regex result accept optional string by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/851
* update url_pattern to pass more wpt on node.js by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/850
* remove default value for regex_provider by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/852
* introduce ADA_USE_UNSAFE_STD_REGEX_PROVIDER flag for security by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/853
* avoiding macro clash by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/854
* why are our examples so complicated? by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/856
* hide implementation detail and update readme by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/855
* use ubuntu ubuntu-22.04-arm on release-prepare by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/857
* chore: release v3.0.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/858

## New Contributors
* @cjauvin made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/807
* @mikea made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/809
* @kassane made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/830
* @mertcanaltin made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/839

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.9.2...v3.0.0

* Fix ubuntu-22.04 workflow by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/691
* perf: optimize `ada::can_parse` more by @anonrig and @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/690
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.2.1 to 8.2.2 in /tools/release by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/697
* build(deps): bump github/codeql-action from 3.25.7 to 3.25.11 by @CarlosEduR and @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/695

* perf: improve has_tabs_or_newline performance by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/670

name: v2.8.0
body:
## What's changed
* Update README.md 'C wrapper' section by @ayshvab in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/630
* add links to the spec by @rluvaton in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/631
* fix: update wpt-updater github workflow by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/633
* chore: update github checkout workflow by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/634
* prevent missing python warning when format feature not requested by @iamtimmy in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/636
* chore: update simdjson, fmt and cxxopts by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/635
* chore: simplify clang-format and update ruff by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/638
* Update web platform tests by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/637
* build(deps): bump actions/checkout from 4.1.2 to 4.1.4 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/648
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 4.2.5 to 4.3.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/647
* build(deps): bump peaceiris/actions-gh-pages from 3.9.3 to 4.0.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/646
* build(deps): bump uraimo/run-on-arch-action from 2.7.1 to 2.7.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/645
* build(deps): bump pytest from 8.1.1 to 8.2.0 in /tools/release by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/643
* build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 4.3.1 to 4.3.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/644
* optimize has_tabs_or_newline for NEON by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/639
* build(deps): bump debian from `7802002` to `155280b` by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/641
* Under Windows, Rust detection is broken and leads to a CMake error. Disabling it. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/651
* Add workflow file to run arm-based testing with sanitizers by @anonrig and @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/649
* Add can_parse to benchmarks by @anonrig and @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/653
* Disable memory sanitizer from fuzz workflow by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/656
* separate fuzzers into different files by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/655
* fix: add git to aarch64 container in CI by @anonrig and @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/652
* Add dictionary to run with fuzzers by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/660
* Provide max_len to libFuzzer by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/661
* path setter bug by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/659
* Use correct fuzzer options by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/663
* Add validate() to parse.cc fuzzer by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/664
* improve parse fuzzer by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/665
* add memory sanitizer to cifuzz workflow by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/667
* fix: modernize python code by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/668
* fix: remove duplicate check on path_signature_table by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/669
* fix: simplify c api by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/671
* refactor: cleanup clang-tidy warnings by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/672
* refactor(ada_c/ada_free_owned_string): remove unused code by @pratikpc in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/673
* Add fuzzer for href setter and getter by @CarlosEduR in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/657
* doc: make sure that it is clear that the strings are assumed to be valid UTF-8. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/675
* docs: add sponsorship links by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/676
* increase fuzzing coverage by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/677
* build: use fixed version for run-on-arch-action by @anonrig in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/678

## New Contributors
* @ayshvab made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/630
* @rluvaton made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/631
* @iamtimmy made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/636
* @CarlosEduR made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/649
* @pratikpc made their first contribution in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/673

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ada-url/ada/compare/v2.7.8...v2.8.0

name: v2.7.7
body:
## What's changed
* Verifying node issue 51619 by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/586

* add C++17 requirement directly in CMake by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/597
* Use docker so that you can clang-format using version 15 everywhere you are. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/585
* Marks as private several functions in our header files. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/600
* This makes ada's target compile options private under Windows. by @lemire in https://github.com/ada-url/ada/pull/599
